nodes.text: "Peter Mayhew: Fantasy Fuzzball" is an interview with Chewbacca actor Peter Mayhew by Mark Newbold featured in Star Wars Insider 189. It covers the origins of Mayhew's casting in the role to an acknowledgment of Star Wars fans for keeping the franchise and characters alive for 40 years. Notably, the interview was published just one day following Mayhew's death on April 30, 2019.
